Text:
Turntable: VPI Scoutmaster
Tonearm: Trans-Fi Termninator
Cartridge: Audio-Technica AT33PTG/II
Phone Stage: Cinemag SUT feeding a Marantz 2220B
Digital Interface: E-MU 1212
Recording Software: Adobe Audition 3.01
Recording Bitrate/Sample Rate: 192/24

Post Processing
Run thru ClickRepair at level 10 with
Pitch Protection | on
Reverse | on
Wavelet | x2
Resample to 96khz in Izotope Rx2 using the default preset
Manually listen to album in Adobe Audition cleaning any clicks/anomalies
Resample/Dither redbook files using Izotope Rx2 default presets.
Flac hi-rez files with Xrecode II

thanks Patrick...

thank you sir for this amazing album anonymous and thanks rj jordan for the equipment info....i knew who's rip this was from the equipment info...thanks to the original uploader too for this wonderful quality i know he doesnt like to publicize his rips so ill respect his wishes just a big thanks to all for keeping vinyl alive.....vintage_vinyl
Thanks for 'a completed upload' showing how it is done right with an excellent recording.Thanks again.
